name: Where's The Sun?
description:
THIS WAS MADE FOR THE LEGACY MOB BEGINNERS GAME JAM #14

The sun has left and that makes you sad. Oh and also the world is kinda dark now.

But wait! You see a light, not a lamp or a fire, a light like the sun! It's small but just seeing it fills you with joy! You touch it and suddenly you become the light, you glow dimly however and  you begin to wonder if there are more lights out there...

CONTROLS

  • A to move left
  • D to move right
  • SPACE to jump/boost
  • E to interact
  • E to drop
  • F to throw

Created using a program called scratch

CREDITS
